sense.gloss: Japanese flying squirrel (Pteromys momonga), small Japanese flying squirrel, Japanese dwarf flying squirrel
sleeping together, sleeping with, sharing a bed
line of spears held at the ready
legendary monster resembling a flying squirrel
Japanese dish prepared with cooked fish and chicken

sdata.j: まず↑最初↑↓さいしょ↓の↑議題↑↓ぎだい↓は↑今朝↑↓けさ↓の↑同衾↑↓どうきん↓↑騒動↑↓そうどう↓の↑件↑↓けん↓について。
sdata.e: Starting off, first on the agenda is about this morning's two-in-a-bed ruckus.

words.gloss: Japanese flying squirrel (Pteromys momonga), small Japanese flying squirrel, Japanese dwarf flying squirrel
sleeping together, sleeping with, sharing a bed
